name: Zombie Attack 3
description: The main character must find the cup in the final level to win. To open the levels, you need to find 10 keys and a save disk. Our hero will be trying to kill zombies, the enemies, but going into a frontal attack is not always rational. Sometimes it's better to go in from the rear. Zombies can be very fast, and you must continually dodge them. Also, collect first-aid kits to stay alive.
